original_text: The brothers sat in a place where Joseph could see them. The servants told each of them where to sit, by their age. The oldest brother was at one end, all along to the youngest brother at the other end. The brothers were very surprised to see this.
korean_text: 그들이 요셉 앞에 앉되 그들의 나이에 따라 앉히게 되니 그들이 서로 이상히 여겼더라

sentences.original_text: The brothers sat in a place

sentences.korean_translation: 요셉이 그들을 볼 수 있는 곳에

sentences.original_text: The servants told each of them
where to sit, by their age
The oldest brother was at one end
sentences.korean_translation: 가장 큰 형은 한쪽 끝에 앉았고

sentences.original_text: all along to the youngest brother
